alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Clay; Foard; Hardeman; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued October 10 at 10:05PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THE TYLER POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR AUDREY LEE, A 7 YEAR OLD WHITE FEMALE. SHE IS 3 FEET 0 INCHES TALL, 40 POUNDS, WITH BROWN HAIR, BLUE EYES, AND WAS LAST SEEN WEARING A MUSTARD COLORED SHIRT AND LIGHT COLOR BLUE JEANS. THE POLICE ARE ALSO SEARCHING FOR AND ELLA LEE, A 9 YEAR OLD WHITE FEMALE. SHE IS 4 FEET 0 INCHES TALL, 60 POUNDS, WITH BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES, AND WAS LAST SEEN WEARING A TAN SHIRT WITH BLACK LETTERING, BLACK SHORTS, AND BABY BLUE HIGH TOP CONVERSE SHOES. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR CHASE LEE IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. HE IS A 33 YEAR OLD WHITE MALE. HE IS 5 FEET 11 INCHES TALL, 170 POUNDS WITH BROWN HAIR, BLUE EYES AND WAS LAST SEEN WEARING A LIGHT- COLORED SHIRT, BLUE JEANS, AND KHAKI COLOR HEY DUDE SHOES. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A WHITE 2007 CHEVROLET AVALANCHE WITH BLACK TRIM WITH SEVERAL GALVESTON BEACH ACCESS STICKERS ON THE FRONT WINDSHIELD BEARING TX LICENSE PLATE NUMBER D X V 6 6 9 5. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THESE CHILDREN TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE TYLER POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 9 0 3 5 3 1 1000.
